resources.string: This application reads and writes NDEF messages from/to an NFC tag.\n\nAdditionally the app shows how to work with encrypted data that needs decryption.

There are 5 icons to click on:
1 home = this page
2 read NDEF message
3 read encr = read an encrypted NDEF message
4 activate the mirroring of data
5 write the NDEF template to the tag

Note: This app is working with tag types NTAG213, NTAG215 or NTAG216 only !
This app reads an NDEF message
This example expects a class 4 type tag with an NDEF record (RTD_TEXT).\n\nWhen a tag is discovered the data from all records will be read.
This app reads an encrypted NDEF message
This example expects a class 4 type tag with an encrypted NDEF record (RTD_TEXT).\n\nWhen a tag is discovered the data from all records will be read.
This example writes an NDEF record (RTD_TEXT) and message to an NTAG 21x tag immediately when a tag is tapped.\nThe old content is overwritten without any recovery options.
If an encryption dataset is found the data is displayed as well and you can enter a passphrase to decrypt the data.
Writes the NDEF message template to the NTAG with defined placeholders for UID, read counter and MAC.\n\nThis is working on tag types NTAG213, 215 or 216 only.
Activate the mirroring of data to NDEF message
Activates the mirroring of data (UID, read counter and MAC) in an NDEF message on tapping
